20101201000704.333|20101201000706.000|CCO|WIFE IN HIS SEAL BEACH
20101201000706.000|20101201000707.667|CCO|NURSING HOME.
20101201000707.667|20101201000709.333|CCO|CLAIRE LAIRD HAD DEMENTIA
20101201000709.333|20101201000711.000|CCO|AND WAS IN POOR HEALTH.
